name: Touhou ~ Phantom Assembler
description:
A certain brown-haired Touhou university student ventures into a dream world. 

v0.1b changes:

  • Fixed End B boss bugs (boss not hovering, boss movement not triggering, attack sound effects playing too frequently, bullet circles spawning at incorrect angles)
  • Fixed minor progression bugs (amulet door inconsistently opening on correct day, interacting with wakeup cube using controller skips storage/levelup menu)
  • Fixed one wall not having collision
  • Modified one light material

CONTROLS:

Also explained in-game but for reference: 

  •  WASD / Left stick: Move
  • Mouse / Right stick: Look/aim
  • Shift + WASD / L1 + Left stick: Sprint
  • Right click / L2: Aim
  • Left click / R2: Shoot (while aiming)
  • Tab / Up on Dpad: Check inventory

Controller works for gameplay but is NOT tested in menus

HINTS:

  • Dream items are used to level up, but can only be eaten outside of the dream world. 
  • All Dream items in your inventory are lost if you die - try to make your way to a wake-up cube if you're carrying a lot of them! (the first wake-up cube is in the surf on the beach)
  • The dream world is not static; as the days progress, other characters may act on their own schedule..

fully responsible for whatever this is (programming, art, writing, music) - https://twitter.com/Rakaasac
